name: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium

candidates.notes: Horton Foote was not present at the awards ceremony. Alan J. Pakula, the film's producer, accepted the award on his behalf.

The nomination for Wilson was granted on 26 September 1995 by the Academy Board of Directors, after research at the WGA found that the then blacklisted writer shared the screenwriting credit with Bolt.

name: Best Writing, Story and Screenplay - Written Directly for the Screen
